name: Login as nobody (Linux)
description: An adversary may try to re-purpose a system account to appear legitimate. In this test change the login shell of the nobody account, change its password to nobody, su to nobody, exit, then reset nobody's shell to /usr/sbin/nologin.

data.command:
cat /etc/passwd |grep nobody 
# -> nobody:x:65534:65534:nobody:/nonexistent:/usr/sbin/nologin
chsh --shell /bin/bash nobody
usermod --password $(openssl passwd -1 nobody) nobody
su nobody
whoami
exit
